title: Luxury Yacht Interior Restoration
description: Complete interior restoration of a 45ft luxury yacht including custom woodwork and modern amenities.
longDescription: This comprehensive project involved the complete transformation of a classic 45-foot luxury yacht's interior. Working closely with the owner, we preserved the vessel's maritime heritage while introducing contemporary comfort and functionality. The project spanned eight weeks and included custom millwork, electrical system upgrades, and premium finishing throughout.

testimonial.text: Ben's attention to detail and craftsmanship exceeded our expectations. The yacht feels like a floating palace while maintaining its classic character.
testimonial.author: James Mitchell
